org.apache.jmeter.protocol.http.proxy

类 Daemon

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • org.apache.jmeter.protocol.http.proxy.Daemon
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.lang.Runnable, Stoppable

    public class Daemon
extends java.lang.Thread
implements Stoppable
    Web daemon thread. Creates main socket on port configured port (8888 by default) and listens on it forever. For each client request, creates a Proxy thread to handle the request.

    • 嵌套类概要

      • 从类继承的嵌套类/接口 java.lang.Thread

        java.lang.Thread.State, java.lang.Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler

    • 字段概要

      • 从类继承的字段 java.lang.Thread

        MAX_PRIORITY, MIN_PRIORITY, NORM_PRIORITY

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      Daemon(int port, ProxyControl target)
      Create a new Daemon with the specified port and target.
      Daemon(int port, ProxyControl target, java.lang.Class<? extends Proxy> proxyClass)
      Create a new Daemon with the specified port and target, using the specified class to handle individual requests.

    • 方法概要

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Daemon

        public Daemon(int port,
              ProxyControl target)
       throws java.io.IOException
        Create a new Daemon with the specified port and target.
        参数:
        port - the port to listen on.
        target - the target which will receive the generated JMeter test components.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs opening the socket
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if port is outside the allowed range from 0 to 65535
        java.net.SocketException - when something is wrong on the underlying protocol layer

      • Daemon

        public Daemon(int port,
              ProxyControl target,
              java.lang.Class<? extends Proxy> proxyClass)
       throws java.io.IOException
        Create a new Daemon with the specified port and target, using the specified class to handle individual requests.
        参数:
        port - the port to listen on.
        target - the target which will receive the generated JMeter test components.
        proxyClass - the proxy class to use to handle individual requests. This class must be the Proxy class or a subclass.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs opening the socket
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if port is outside the allowed range from 0 to 65535
        java.net.SocketException - when something is wrong on the underlying protocol layer

    • 方法详细资料

      • run

        public void run()
        Listen on the daemon port and handle incoming requests. This method will not exit until stopServer() is called or an error occurs.
        指定者:
        run 在接口中 java.lang.Runnable
        覆盖:
        run 在类中 java.lang.Thread

      • stopServer

        public void stopServer()
        Stop the proxy daemon. The daemon may not stop immediately. see #ACCEPT_TIMEOUT
        指定者:
        stopServer 在接口中 Stoppable
